name: World of Warships: Legends — Power of Independence
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Power of Independence
description:
The legendary Arizona, mounted with the special Stars and Stripes camo, is the perfect combo of brute force and good looks!

This pack contains: - 30 Premium Days - Arizona Tier V ship - Star and Stripes permanent camouflage - 750 doubloons - 37,000 Commander XP

Note: this pack comes with 10 Halloween camos as a bonus!

Doubloons will be given as compensation for duplicate Premium ships.
